title: The. Sims 3 Complete Limited Edition Stuff

Generations Bonus:
GenRegGifts
This set contains two stylish tops, one for male sims other for female sims, it features a old fashioned style telephone.

Pets Bonus:
IIAMs2011EP5Reg (Iams Pet Starter Kit / IAMS Dog Set)
IAMS set perfect for your sims dog, set includes food bowl and dog toy.

Pets Bonus:
PetStoreEp5Set (Pet Store)
With this set you can place your very own petshop in your sims town, allowing you to buy and sell minor pets, and pet products.

Pets Bonus:
EP5RegSet (Atomic Age Pets Registration Gifts / Retro Pet set)
A fantastic retro pet set which includes a bed and stylish pet bowl. 

Showtime Bonus:
UltimateVenueStageEP6
The Limited Edition of The Sims 3 Showtime includes a code for a download of the Ultimate Venue.
It is a ready-built Big Show Venue with a new building shell and stage. The building may also
function as a theatre for your town.

Showtime Bonus:
KatyPerryEP6SET
Make your rise to fame in The Sims 3: Showtime Katy Perry CollectorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Edition with unique
Katy Perry themed in-game content and an exclusive poster.

Showtime Bonus:
EP6DJTurntableModernSET
Be the life of the party! Be the DJ and spin those vinyls like there's no tomorrow! 

Showtime Bonus:
EP6StereoSurfaceMidCPop
Your Sims can listen to their favourite music on this out of this world looking stereo. 

Supernatural Bonus:
EP7LimitedEditionSET
Preorder The Sims 3: Supernatural Limited Edition and receive exclusive content from the world of Plants vs Zombies, including new outfits and a working Peashooter!

Plantern lamp Ã¢â‚¬â€œ This unique item looks just like the planterns that keep the fog

EP7RegSET
Enjoy the Sweet Pea Cardigan, Academia Cardigan, and the Vintage Rotary Phone when you register your game today! Complete your sets with the Everyday Casual Chic and Comfortable Living sets now available at The Sims 3 Store.

Seasons Bonus:
EP8IceLoungeSET
This is the bonus venue included with Sims 3 Seasons Limited Edition. Everything is made of ice. Items are not recolourable.

Seasons Bonus:
EP8OriginSET
This set was available if you purchased Sims 3 Seasons from Origin.com. Ã‚Â It is two costumes for the Trick or Treat. Shark Costume fits male and female Sims from age child to elder. And you Sims can swim in it. Little Bee is a cute childrenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s costume that fits male and female.

University Life Bonus:
EP9OriginSET
This is the exclusive School Spirit pack, which was available only if you downloaded The Sims 3 University Life directly from Origin.

This set includes the Carnaval Costumes Pack. 

Island Paradise Bonus:
EP10RegSET
It's a fact, gamers love hats! As a small token of our appreciation for registering The Sims 3 Island Paradise, enjoy these two hats that set a festive tropical mood. You can be the most eye-catching chica or chico on the beach with the towering fruit hat,

MoviesetSP9

The Chamber can quip your Sim with a
futuristic Quantum Power Suit, enabling them to teleport around the globe or scan the
